SMW Subobject for NightmareExamine: Quite the little nightmare.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Little nightmareUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Little nightmare.pngWeight: 0.015Value: 1Version anchor: NightmareRelease date: 6 February 2020Item ID: 24491

The Little Nightmare is a pet that can be obtained by defeating The Nightmare. It is a much smaller version of her. The drop rate of the Little Nightmare depends on the amount of players in the fight; 1/800 for one, 1/1,600 for two, 1/2,400 for three, 1/3,200 for four, and 1/4,000 for groups five or more.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the chatbox will state You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a cat), it will be placed into their inventory. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack. If a players inventory is full and they have a follower already, they will not receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 coins to Probita in East Ardougne to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 coins.

The little nightmare is able to metamorphose into a little parasite. For Little nightmare to be able to do so, players must use the Parasitic Egg on her.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)
  • A typo in the NPC name for the Little Parasite was corrected; previously it was named "Little Parasaite".
  • The Little Parasite now uses its proper chathead model when spoken to, rather than using the Little Nightmare's chathead.
11 November 2020
(update | poll)

The pet drop rate has been changed to scale with group size. Previously, it was always 1/4,000 (or 1/3,800 for the MVP).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The player asks if the male equivalent of a nightmare (as mare is the common name of a female horse) would be a nighthorse, although the common name for a male horse is a stallion.
  • Little nightmare had a festive override wearing a red partyhat during the 2020 and 2021 Christmas events.

The '''Little Nightmare''' is a [[pet]] that can be obtained by defeating [[The Nightmare]]. It is a much smaller version of her. The drop rate of the Little Nightmare depends on the amount of players in the fight; 1/800 for one, 1/1,600 for two, 1/2,400 for three, 1/3,200 for four, and 1/4,000 for groups five or more.

When a player receives the pet, it will automatically try to appear as their follower. At the same time, a red message in the [[Chat Interface|chatbox]] will state {{Colour|#ef1020|You have a funny feeling like you're being followed.}}

However, if a player receives a pet while having a follower out (for example, a [[cat]]), it will be placed into their [[inventory]]. When this occurs, the message in the chatbox will instead state {{Colour|#ef1020|You feel something weird sneaking into your backpack.}} If a players inventory is full '''and''' they have a follower already, they '''will not''' receive the pet.

On death, if a player loses their pet (as a follower or in your inventory) it will wander around for 30 seconds before disappearing completely.

Players can pay a one-time fee of 500,000 [[coins]] to [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] to have this pet insured. Should the pet be lost while insured, it can be reclaimed for 1,000,000 [[coins]].

The little nightmare is able to metamorphose into a little parasite. For Little nightmare to be able to do so, players must use the [[Parasitic Egg]] on her.
